quorum.description: Minimum percentage of total stake needed to vote for a result to be  considered valid.

threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 0.5.

veto_threshold.description: Minimum value of Veto votes to Total votes ratio for proposal to be  vetoed. Default value: 1/3.

TallyParams.title: Tally Params
TallyParams.description: TallyParams defines the params for tallying votes on governance proposals.
